homepage.first-block-desc: Your perfect tool for swapping tokens beetween networks
homepage.second-block-desc: During the development of systems that utilize many smart contracts it is common to see them have long staging period before going to production.
homepage.second-block-second-desc: Right now the only way to obtain test ether is to use faucets. We are building a service for purchasing test tokens for real tokens on EVM-like networks. Basically, we propose a {part1}, hence embracing the applied task.
